Technology Research

Framework

Django or Flask?

Our goal is to develop a database driven website so we researched best-fit web development framework including Django and Flask.
We considered thoroughly and compared between these 2 frameworks and decided to choose Django. Overall Django is heavy weight with many pre-build features while Flask can be more flexible and more suitable for smaller projects. For our project specifically, Django' pre build functionalities such as admin interface are right fit and convenient as well as providing higher security. Django are also very scalable for further development and has a community for maintaince.

Frameworks Security Admin site Flexibility
Django Django is highly secure. It has its own authentication system. It also has build in fuctions to prevent malicious attacks.(e.g XSS protection,SQL injection protection,Clickjacking protection) Django has build in Automatic Admin interface which can be used as internal website management tool. It gives specified types of users access to certain functionalities. This can save us alot of time since we need similar features for our website to manage ocularists type and admin type users. User has to write code in 'Django way' due to the many pre build features
Flask Flask provides extensible library tool for you to set up your own security setting, It can potentially introduce more security vulnerability It does not have build in admin site but has extensible library as tools Flask gives developer full control over the content

front-end Framework

Bootstrap

Bootstrap is a CSS framework for responsive front-end web development. It provides templates for variaty interface components such as navigation bars and tables. It also has unique grid systems allowing easier layout design for both mobile and desktop websites. This is can speed up our implementation.Our project need to consider user interface for both mobile and webpages since ocularists and admins might use our website from mobile phones.

Language

Python or Java?

Python is a excellent language for web development. It provide tons of frameworks such as Django, flask and FastAPI. It is expressive and has great simplicity. Python is dynamically typed and has a easier syntax than java which allows faster implementation. This is a major advantage considering time constraints for our project. All of our team members are familiar with Python so that it makes collaboration smoother.

Java is also a popular language for web-development. It is generally faster and has better performance than python. It has relativly complex syntax rules. After comparing both languages we decide to choose Python.

virtual Enviroment

Docker or linode?

Linode provides virtual private servers

Technical Decisions

Web Development Framework Django
